repnme.cdata!: Colombia - Second Bogota Water Supply Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Bogota Water Supply Project
            will include a dam on the Chuza River, a 39 km conveyance
            system (consisting of 33 km of tunnels and 6 km of
            pipelines) from the dam to Bogota, additions to the
            city's distribution system, equipment, and engineering services.

docna.cdata!:
Colombia - Second Bogota Water Supply
            Project : Loan 0741 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Colombia - Second Bogota Water
            Supply Project : Loan 0741 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Colombia - Second Bogota Water Supply
            Project : Loan 0741 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Colombia - Second Bogota Water
            Supply Project : Loan 0741 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would include a new water
            treatment plant, improvements to the existing plant, a new
            water main from the plant to the city and substantial
            additions to the distribution system; the most urgent
            sewerage and drainage works would also be constructed. The
            Second Bogota Water Supply Project will include a dam on the
            Chuza River, a 39 km conveyance system (consisting of 33 km
            of tunnels and 6 km of pipelines) from the dam to Bogota,
            additions to the city's distribution system, equipment,
            and engineering services.
